summary: A young writer tries to impress a girl he meets online with an embellished profile, but he finds himself in a real mess when she falls for him and he has to keep up the act.
cast: Justin Long|Keir O'Donnell|Evan Rachel Wood|Gideon Glick|Sienna Miller|Mizuo Peck|Peter Dinklage|Busy Philipps|Sam Rockwell|Vince Vaughn|Adam Johnson|Jee Young Han|Jenn Harris|Demosthenes Chrysan|Lynn Cohen|David Margulies|Tom Morrissey|Priscilla Lopez|Emilio Delgado|Danielle Quisenberry|Savannah Wise|Nick Fondulis|Charlotte Kendrick|Brendan Fraser|Laura Jordan|Peter Billingsley|Scott Adsit|Manny Siverio|Devin Flores|Joel Brody|Dono Cunningham
keywords: facebook|guitar lesson|reference to princess leia|reference to carrie fisher|false identity
title: Una historia de amor
